message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a fantastic deal. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15,000. What do you think?
Thanks for offering! That's a bit out of my price range right now.  Would you consider $6,000?
I appreciate your interest in the product, but $6,000 is a bit low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I can offer it to you for $10,000. What do you think?
I understand it's a great product, and I'm willing to increase my offer to $7,000. Would that work for you?
I appreciate your willingness to increase your offer, but I'm still not quite there. I'm willing to compromise, so I can offer it to you for $11,000. What do you think?
